  "Initiated By" : "AL",
  "Allegations" : "ON AUGUST 26, 1997, WORLD FINANCIAL SERVICES, INC. FILED AN APPLICATION FOR REGISTRATION AS A DEALER IN THE STATE OF ALABAMA, WITH A STATEMENT THAT NO OFFERS HAD BEEN MADE TO ALABAMA RESIDENTS. INFORMATION FROM WORLD'S CLEARING FIRM DISCLOSED THAT WORLD HAS 4 ALABAMA ACCOUNTS OPENED AND DURING THE PERIOD 12/31/96 TO 08/27/97 A TOTAL OF 34 TRANSACTIONS WERE EFFECTED IN 2 OF THE ACCOUNTS BY DAVID ALAN SPECTOR. BASED UPON VIOLATIONS OF SECTIONS 8-6-3(a) and 8-6-3(j)(1), CODE OF ALABAMA 1975, FOR EFFECTING TRANSACTIONS IN ALABAMA PRIOR TO REGISTRATION AND FOR FILING AN APPLICATION WHICH CONTAINED A FALSE STATEMENT, ON 09/29/97 A CEASE AND DESIST ORDER WAS ISSUED TO WORLD AND SPECTOR. WORLD WAS REQUIRED TO MAKE RESCISSION OFFERS TO THE 2 ALABAMA RESIDENTS, IN THE AGGREGATE AMOUNT OF $59,762.09, WHICH WERE REJECTED.",
  "Resolution" : "Consent",
  "SanctionDetails" : [ ],
  "Sanction Details" : "THE VIOLATIONS WERE RESOLVED BY CONSENT ORDER CO-97-0054, ON 12/08/97 AND WORLD WAS LEVIED AN ADMINISTRATIVE ASSESSMENT OF $3,000 AND INVESTIGATIVE COSTS OF $1,000.",
